H0.text: Which `B` was the name of the mechanical shark used in the original `Jaws` film. Baxter

H1.text: Which `B` was the name of the mechanical shark used in the original `Jaws` film. Barnaby

H2.text: Which `B` was the name of the mechanical shark used in the original `Jaws` film. Boris

H3.text: Which `B` was the name of the mechanical shark used in the original `Jaws` film. Bruce

A4.text: the film crew nicknamed the mechanical sharks 'Bruce' after Spielberg's lawyer, Bruce Ramer.
